headline: The higher education blogs network
text: PolicyIncluding blogs on innovation, the definition of higher education and analysis of practices within the HE sector. LeadershipBlogs covering leadership, team building and management issues relevant to university administration and academics. Student experienceThe blogs on this page explore how students can make the most of their time and staff can boost student academic and professional development. ResearchThese blogs look at research and research skills in academia, as well as offering inspiration and guidance to academic professionals.  Professional developmentA diverse range of blogs covering topics such as how to make the right career choices and how to develop your own academic skills. FinanceLeading opinions, thoughts and observations from the fields of finance, international business and science. Marketing and communicationsThe communications blogs contain useful resources on marketing, public relations and internal communications for higher education institutions. TechnologyExamining the role of technology in academia and developing HE issues relating to personal and professional accessibility. InternationalA look at some of the issues facing academics in other countries, as well as issues of internationalisation across global higher education. If you run a blog that you think should be featured in this directory, get in touch via email or Twitter using the hashtag #HEblognetwork This content is brought to you by Guardian Professional. To get more articles like this direct to your inbox, become a member of the Higher Education Network.
